Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Mental Health, Mental Retardation, Alcoholism, Drug Abuse and Disability Services

Items.Title: Oversight - Examining the Roles of the NYPD and the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene in Responding to Calls to the Police Involving Emotionally Disturbed People
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Examining the Roles of the NYPD and the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene in Responding to Calls to the Police Involving Emotionally Disturbed People

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Mental Health, Mental Retardation, Alcoholism, Drug Abuse and Disability Services

Resolution calling on the Mayor, the New York City Police Department, and the New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene to continually reevaluate their protocols and response to field incidents concerning the apprehension of, restraint of, and use of lethal force against emotionally disturbed persons.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Continually reevaluate protocols and response to field incidents concerning the apprehension of, restraint of, and use of lethal force against emotionally disturbed persons.

Items.Title: Oversight - Examining the Roles of the NYPD and the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene in Responding to Calls to the Police Involving Emotionally Disturbed People
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Examining the Roles of the NYPD and the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene in Responding to Calls to the Police Involving Emotionally Disturbed People

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the Mayor, the New York City Police Department, and the New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene to continually reevaluate their protocols and response to field incidents concerning the apprehension of, restraint of, and use of lethal force against emotionally disturbed persons.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Continually reevaluate protocols and response to field incidents concerning the apprehension of, restraint of, and use of lethal force against emotionally disturbed persons.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Felder, Koppell, Vann and Ignizio
